attributes.review: it all started when i downloaded the app. i wanted to see all the hype from my trump supporter friends. i got the app and i checked it out. it was scary. “keep america great” EVERYWHERE! it was terrifying. but that’s not the worst part. i deleted the app and went to bed. that night i had a nightmare. i was voting and i couldn’t control myself. then. i voted for trump. i was wearing a trump shirt and hat. then the worst thing happened. i went to a rally and saw him IN PERSON. it was scary. the worst dream i ever had. but that’s not the worst part. i woke up the next morning and the trump app was on my phone again. i thought maybe i never deleted it and i just dreamed i did. so i deleted it again. i carried on through my day listening to the mindless trump supporters talking their crap. then at night i was about to go to bed. i saw it. the app was back. i heard little whispers in my ear. “trumppppp” “TRUMPPPPP” and i thought i was imagining it all. all until i heard a tap... tap... tap... on my window. i figured it was the wind. tap... tap... tap... i tried to go to sleep. tap. tap. tap. getting louder every time. til eventually those little taps turned into TAP. TAP. TAP.  i looked out my window to see a mob of angry trump supporters saying. use the apppp USE THE APPPPP. i did what i needed to. i threw that phone in a river and got a new one. i watched the trump supporters mindlessly wandering by waiting for someone to mob. moral of the story, don’t get this app.
attributes.title: DONT GET THIS APP

attributes.review: alright so I’ve been hearing people talking about this dude that apparently became our president in 2016 and I was like alright well I don’t really get into politics. yk. so I didn’t pay attention or care untill one day someone was like oh he’s so bad like he’s this racist guy and he’s also a rapist guy. and I was like no. way. like omg holy heck woah. he stands for everything I believe in like I just love me a president who hates most of the american people that he’s supposed to protect and such. and I mean it’s just a bonus😍 that he also rapes women and grabs them by their 🐱 just as if they were objects to him like wow. a real man. so I was like alright! I’m sold! where can I support this guy (who by the way just sounds like a real Christian guy to me like hating people? check. raping people? check! like I’m pretty sure if you looked in the Bible you’d find all of that somewhere like he really sounds like man of God.) so I was on tiktok one day and I heard someone mention this app so I had to check it out😁. I was real excited too like I was like woah we need to keep america great and keep this guy in office! but then😣 when the app finally downloaded🤧. I’m sorry this is so hard to speak about like it’s kinda traumatic.😪😪 I saw this man.🤢🤮🤮 the😭 grossest😭 man😭 I’ve😭 ever😭 seen😭. like😰😰 doesn’t he own a mirror?? it was so terrifying that I immediately burst into tears and deleted the app!! Now I’m writing this review in hopes🙏🏻 of saving some other persons eyes and heart. I had so much hope in this guy and I wanted to support him😪. but I can’t. support. an. orange. president.🥺 I mean that’s not even a real skin color🤢. anyhoo don’t get this app it’s trash🗑 all I have to say is OBAMA 2020🙏🏻🙏🏻❤️❤️ he may not have been a racist or a rapist, but he wasn’t orange.❤️❤️
attributes.title: bruh. who let this man be our presidenttt??

attributes.review:
Shrek script

Once upon a time there was a lovely princess. But she had an enchantment upon her of a fearful sort, which could only be broken by Love's first kiss. She was locked away in a castle guarded by a terrible fire breathing dragon. Many brave knights had attempted to free her from this dreadful prison, but none prevailed. She waited in the dragon's keep in the highest room of the tallest tower for her true love and true love's first kiss. Like that's ever going to happen. What a loony. Shrek Beware Stay out I think he's in here. All right. Lets get it! Hold on. Do you know what that thing can do to you? Yeah. He'll groan into your bones for his brains. Well actually that would be a giant. Now Ogres, huh, they are much worse. They'll make a soup from your freshly peeled skin. They'll chew your livers, squeeze the jelly from your eyes. Actually, it's quite good on toast. Back, back beast, back! I warned you! Right. This is the part, where you run away. Yeah! And stay out. Wanted. Fairytale creatures. Right, this one is full. Take it away. Give me that. Your fine days are over. -25 pieces of silver for the witch. Next. -Come on. Sit down there! And be quiet! This cage is so small. You wouldn't turn me in. I'll never be stubborn again. I can change. Please, give me another chance. Oh, shut up! Next. What do we got? This little wooden puppet. I'm not a puppet, I'm a real boy. Five shillings for the possessed toy. Take it away. No! Please, don't let them do it! Next. What do you got? Well, I've got a talking donkey! Right. Well that's good for ten schillings, if you can prove it. Oh, go ahead fella. Well? He's just a li..., just a little nervous. He's really quite a chatterbox. You boneheaded donkey! That's it. I have heard enough. Guards! No, no, he talks, he does! I can talk. I love to talk. I've talked to... Get her out of my sight! -No, no, I swear! Hey, I can fly. -He can fly! -He can fly! He can talk! -That's right, fool! Now I'm a flying, talking donkey! You might have seen house fly, maybe even a superfly. But I bet you ain't never seen a donkey fly! Seize him! Get him! This way! Hurry! You there. Ogre. -I. By the order of lord Farquaad. I am authorized to place you both under arrest. And transport you to designated resettlement facility. Oh really? You and what army? Can I say something to you? Listen, you were really, really something, back there. Incredible. Are you talking to... ...me? Yes, I was talking to you. Can I just tell you that you were really great back there with those guards. They thought that was all over there. And then you showed up and BAM. There was tripping on over themselves like babes in the woods. That really made me feel good to see that. Oh, that's great. Really. Man, it's good to be free. Now, why don't you go celebrate your freedom with your own friends? But I... I don't have any friends. And I'm not going out there by myself. Hey wait a minute. I have a great idea... I'll stick with you. You and me in green fighting machine. PERIYAT !!!
attributes.title: TRASH
